mapper.sql: ID, GROUP_CODE, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_ICON, PRI_CODE, PRI_NAME, PRI_ICON, CREATE_TIME
mapper.insert:
insert into auth_channel_priviledge
ID,
GROUP_CODE,
GROUP_NAME,
PRI_CODE,
PRI_NAME,
CREATE_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{priCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{priName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update auth_channel_priviledge
GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_NAME = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRI_CODE = #{priCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRI_NAME = #{priName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update auth_channel_priviledge set GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_NAME = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRI_CODE = #{priCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRI_NAME = #{priName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT pri.ID AS id, pri.GROUP_CODE AS groupCode, pri.GROUP_NAME AS groupName, pri.GROUP_ICON AS groupIcon, pri.PRI_CODE AS priCode, pri.PRI_NAME AS priName, pri.PRI_ICON AS priIcon, pri.CREATE_TIME AS createTime FROM auth_role_priviledge map JOIN auth_channel_priviledge pri ON map.PRI_ID = pri.ID WHERE ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT p.ID AS id, p.GROUP_CODE AS groupCode, p.GROUP_NAME AS groupName, p.GROUP_ICON AS groupIcon, p.PRI_CODE AS priCode, p.PRI_NAME AS priName, p.PRI_ICON AS priIcon, p.CREATE_TIME AS createTime FROM auth_merchant_role m JOIN auth_role_priviledge r JOIN auth_channel_priviledge p ON m.role_id = r.role_id AND r.pri_id = p.id WHERE m.merchant_id=#{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
